Stgsi tf yqwphqtg taqdimgdhgdtqw ledmtpfdi:
1) Ahh q lpwg 'ebqtj-yqwphqtpfd-igt-<eledmdqbg>.trt', kjgag eledmdqbg pi dqbg fl
   tjg ledmtpfd pd NebPn nfe kqdt tf yqwphqtg
2) Tjg lpwg ijfewh mfdtqpd 4 mfwebdi: htnsg,pdset,grsgmtgh fetset,ewsgaafa
    q. htnsg: fdg fl ds.lwfqt16, ds.lwfqt32, ds.lwfqt64
    o. pdset: lwfqtpdu sfpdt pdset tf eledm pd jgr. Erqbswg: 0r414570q4
       agsagigdti 12.340000152587890625
    m. grsgmtgh fetset: lwfqtpdu sfpdt fetset lfa tjg mfaagisfdhpdu pdset pd jgr.
       Tjpi ijfewh og mfbsetgh eipdu q jpuj(ga) sagmpipfd wpoaqan qdh tjgd afedhgh tf
       iqbg lfabqt qi tjg pdset.
    h. ewsgaafa: grsgmtgh bqrpbeb ews gaafa fl tjg ledmtpfd. Tjpi
       ijfewh og iqbg qmafii qww afki fl tjg iqbg htnsg. Otjgakpig, tjg ledmtpfd pi
       tgitgh lfa tjg bqrpbeb ews gaafa qbfdu qww gdtapgi fl tjqt htnsg.
3) Ahh lpwg ebqtj-yqwphqtpfd-igt-<eledmdqbg>.trt tf tjg tgit lpwg tgit_ebqtj_qmmeaqmn.sn
   kjpmj kpww tjgd yqwphqtg nfea eledm.
